location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
job_description: Position Summary Role and Responsibilities Research, design and apply machine learning for auto defect analysis and issues detection. Improve auto ecosystem with intelligent auto testing solution. Data analysis and find out the issue, analyze production defect in real market. Ensures completion of all documentation required for production introduction. Use GitHub for source code repository and Jira for task tracking. Skills And Qualifications Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience. 2+ years of experience with Python, SQL/NoSQL, Linux, Docker, AI Good in English communication for working. Ability to work on multiple tasks concurrently. Self-motivated with a strong desire to learn. Solid decision-making skills and judgment – can be depended upon to meet goals, foresee and avert problems. Python programming experience. Solid scripting skills (i.e., shell scripts, Python). Familiarity in relevant machine learning frameworks and packages such as Tensorflow and PyTorch. Thorough understanding of NLP techniques for text representation and modeling Strong understanding SLQ/NoSQL, Docker. Familiar with graph, data display & analysis. Please visit Samsung membership to see Privacy Policy, which defaults according to your location. You can change Country/Language at the bottom of the page. If you are European Economic Resident, please click here.

location: Ho Chi Minh City Metropolitan Area
job_description: As an AI Developer , you will design, develop and implement AI-enhanced applications. You will analyze data sets to identify patterns, create frameworks and develop predictive algorithmic models to deliver intelligent systems that are capable of performing tasks that usually require human cognition in order to solve complex business problems and for faster business processing. Specifically, you are expected to: Design, develop, optimize, and implement AI systems to meet business requirements. Monitor the performance of deployed scalable AI models and frameworks, making necessary adjustments or updates to improve accuracy and reliability, and address any issues or bugs that arise during the system's operation. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze the business needs and define problems to identify the goals and requirements of AI systems. Work closely with the development team to ensure seamless AI development and integration, and define APIs and protocols for communication between AI systems and external services. Document AI models and infrastructure, processes, and practices for reference, and present progress to the leadership team and stakeholders. Implement strong data security and privacy measures for data handled in AI applications. Stay current with emerging AI research and technologies, and initiate innovative solutions & improvements to advance our AI capabilities. Conduct training and share knowledge & expertise in AI to the team. Your profile: Bachelors degree in Computer Science, IT, Data Science, or any related field. 2 years of experience with AI development, Natural Language Processing, and Large Language Models. Proven track record of deploying AI models in production. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or C++. Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, Scikit-learn) Familiarity with machine learning models & algorithms, cloud computing platforms (AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform), containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), deep learning and concepts of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and/or Natural Language Generation (NLG) Eagerness to learn and continuously expand knowledge in emerging fields. Has strong interpersonal and communication skills with a willingness to collaborate with different teams. Others: This is for a hybrid work setup. Successful completion of background check and NBI clearance will be required.

company: TMA Solutions - Tuyển Dụng Ứng Viên Kinh Nghiệm
location: Quang Trung Ward, Hanoi, Vietnam
job_description: Số lượng: 5 Ngày hết hạn: 31/03/2026 Tòa nhà TMA - Lô số 17, đường số 10, Khu Công viên phần mềm Quang Trung, Phường Trung Mỹ Tây, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh. Kinh nghiệm: Đã có kinh nghiệm Job Description We are looking for talent AI Engineer to implement and optimize AI products. Responsibilities Data collecting, labeling and preprocessing. Research and training AI/ML model for specific problem Develop AI/ML application, especially for Computer Vision, Audio, RAG, ... Validating, testing and retrain to improve the AI/ML model. Deploy AI/ML application in cloud platform, such as AWS, GCP Optimize AI/ML model that can be run on Edge devices. Required Skills/Experience Good Knowledge in Linear Algebra and Statistical Probability Strong background in at least one areas of machine learning algorithm, such as Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision Tree. Good knowledge in Deep Learning network, such as CNN, RNN, Transformer, ... Good knowledge in training and finetuning AI/ML model. Familiar with AI/ML development framework like Tensorflow, Pytorch. Strong programming background and data structure as well as algorithm Good at Python and/or C/C++ Familiar with Linux OS, such as Ubuntu, Debian, ... Familiar with Anaconda and Jupiter notebook Good analytical and problem-solving capabilities Intermediate English skills Have knowledge in Clouding Computing and Big Data is a plus Years Of Experiences Fresher Experienced >2YoE Benefits/ Opportunity Working in an international, dynamic and professional environment with many opportunities to develop career Having opportunities of being trained oversea and working directly with oversea customer A stable and rewarding position where your long-term commitment will be highly valued Technical & Soft skills internal training courses Many company activities (Sport and music festival, TMA Futsal league …) are held annually Competitive salary and bonus Total Health Care Insurance Loan Fund Team Building Fund

job_title: AI_NLP ENGINEER (SALARY UP TO 40 MIL GROSS + BONUS)
location: Hanoi, Hanoi, Vietnam
job_description: Mô tả công việc Architect and Develop Advanced NLP Models: Pioneer cutting-edge solutions for a range of educational applications, including: Automated Scoring & Feedback: Design systems for instant and accurate scoring of essays, pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary. Intelligent Learning Assistants: Build sophisticated AI tutors and conversational agents that can understand student queries, provide contextual explanations, and guide them through their learning journey. Robust Speech Technologies: Implement and fine-tune state-of-the-art Speech-to-Text (S2T) and Text-to-Speech (T2S) models to create immersive practice environments. Pioneer our AI Conversation Partner: Build the core AI for a virtual speaking partner, designed specifically to help users build real-world communication skills through interactive, realistic dialogues with instant coaching. Research & Implementation: Stay at the forefront of AI research, experimenting with and applying the latest techniques (e.g., Transformers, Large Language Models) to solve unique challenges in language education. Collaborate and Ship: Work closely with product managers, software engineers, and language experts to integrate your AI models into our products, ensuring they are scalable, efficient, and deliver tangible value to our users. Yêu cầu công việc Hard Skills Requirements Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related fields. At least 2 years of experience in the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP). Proficient in programming languages, especially Python (knowledge of C/C++ is an advantage), and capable of using frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch. Expertise in building, analyzing data, training, and optimizing NLP models. Experience in model serving (using RayServe, Triton, TorchServe, etc.) and service integration and deployment is an advantage. Significant experience with Large Language Models (LLM) is a major advantage. Proficient use of Git, Docker. Experience with data organization systems: Database (Postgres, MySQL), Cache (Redis), Queue (RabbitMQ, Kafka) is an advantage. Ability to comprehend technical documents, scientific articles, and stay up-to-date with the State of The Art (SOTA). Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Proficient in applying AI to research and problem solving Soft Skills Requirements High enthusiasm and responsibility. Good communication skills, proactive, flexible at work, collaborative, and friendly within the team. Careful in work and considerate of customers. Fluency in English and Chinese is an advantage. Tại sao bạn yêu thích làm việc tại đây Salary: Up to 40 million VND. KPI bonus based on work results and company revenue (2-4 million/month), paid in monthly salary. Salary increases based on performance and contribution. Flexible working hours, a youthful and dynamic work environment. Health insurance, team building activities, annual vacations. Location: 34 Lang Ha Ward, Dong Da District, Ha Noi City. Hours: From Monday to Friday (40 hours/Week)

job_description: Thu nhập Negotiation Cấp bậc Leader Hình thức Full Time Địa điểm làm việc Đà Nẵng Hạn ứng tuyển 2025-07-18 TECHVIFY Corporation is an End to End AI-Powered Digital Transformation Partner. At TECHVIFY, we don’t just build software. We engineer breakthroughs. We innovate with AI, craft with code, and scale with cloud. We partner with startups, enterprises, and even competitors on a shared mission: To turn bold ideas into real-world impact. If you’re looking to lead digital transformation through intelligent software, we’re ready to build with you. Let’s create the future – together. Responsibilities Lead the QA efforts for various projects, including a waste management system and trading domain applications. Build and manage a QA team for project D3, ensuring high standards of quality and performance. Develop comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts based on project requirements. Execute manual and automated testing, analyze test results, and report defects. Collaborate with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure quality throughout the software development process. Mentor and train junior QA team members to enhance their skills and knowledge. Continuously improve QA processes and methodologies to increase efficiency and effectiveness. Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience in Quality Assurance, with expertise in Manual QA, Automation QA, Performance QA. Proven experience in developing and executing test plans, test cases, test scripts and security testing. Strong understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and QA methodologies. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams. Familiarity with testing tools and frameworks such as Selenium, JMeter, or similar. Ability to analyze complex systems and identify potential quality issues. Benefits Competitive hourly compensation, commensurate with experience. Opportunity for career advancement, including the potential to become a QA Manager. Work in a dynamic and collaborative environment that promotes professional growth. Engage in diverse projects that enhance your skills and experience in quality assurance. Access to ongoing training and development opportunities to stay updated with industry trends and best practices. How to Apply If you are a driven and talented Quality Assurance Leader looking for an opportunity to be part of something extraordinary, please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration. Join our team and let’s create amazing things together! location: Đà Nang, Da Nang City, Vietnam
job_description: Thu nhập Up to 60M Cấp bậc Senior Hình thức Full Time Địa điểm làm việc Đà Nẵng Introduction TECHVIFY Corporation is an End to End AI-Powered Digital Transformation Partner. At TECHVIFY, we don’t just build software. We engineer breakthroughs. We innovate with AI, craft with code, and scale with cloud. We partner with startups, enterprises, and even competitors on a shared mission: To turn bold ideas into real-world impact. If you’re looking to lead digital transformation through intelligent software, we’re ready to build with you. Let’s create the future – together. Responsibilities As a Technical Project Manager, you will be the bridge between technology and strategy , guiding talented teams to deliver exceptional results. You will: Lead and nurture high-performing teams and growing them. Oversee the progress of existing project and take ownership of new initiatives. Collaborate with stakeholders to define project vision, scope, and key deliverables. Ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and to the highest quality standards. Mentor and inspire team members, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and accountability. Proactively identify risks and devise strategies to mitigate them. Maintain clear and compelling project documentation for management and stakeholders. Requirements Proven experience as a Technical Leader, Project Manager or Technical Project Manager, with deep understanding of Agile frameworks (Scrum Master certification is a plus). Strong technical foundation in .NET, Node.js, Java, Azure, AWS, or related technologies. Exceptional English communication skills for effective collaboration across global teams. Natural leadership and team management abilities, with the capacity to inspire and guide talented professionals. Sharp problem-solving, organizational, and decision-making skills. Ability to balance strategic vision with hands-on technical insight. Benefits Salary: Up to 60M Join a global team and work directly with many talents around the world. Opportunities for onsite work in Japan, Singapore, Australia, and many other countries. Work and grow in a dynamic, creative, and professional environment. Healthcare: Premium Health Insurance TECHVIFY Care 13 months’ salary per year. Annual salary evaluation. Sponsor and encourage staff to study courses by covering tuition fees, such as Udemy, Coursera. How to Apply If you are a driven and talented Technical Project Manager looking for an opportunity to be part of something extraordinary, please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration. Join our team and let’s create amazing things together! job_title: Senior Software Engineer, AI Model Serving - Da Nang, Vietnam
location: Đà Nang, Da Nang City, Vietnam
job_description: Mission The mission of Speechify is to make sure that reading is never a barrier to learning. Over 50 million people use Speechify's text-to-speech products to turn whatever they're reading – PDFs, books, Google Docs, news articles, websites – into audio, so they can read faster, read more, and remember more. Speechify's text-to-speech reading products include its iOS app, Android App, Mac App, Chrome Extension, and Web App. Google recently named Speechify the Chrome Extension of the Year and Apple named Speechify its App of the Day. Today, nearly 200 people around the globe work on Speechify in a 100% distributed setting – Speechify has no office. These include frontend and backend engineers, AI research scientists, and others from Amazon, Microsoft, and Google, leading PhD programs like Stanford, high growth startups like Stripe, Vercel, Bolt, and many founders of their own companies. This is a key role and ideal for someone who thinks strategically, enjoys fast-paced environments, passionate about making product decisions, and has experience building great user experiences that delight users. We are a flat organization that allows anyone to become a leader by showing excellent technical skills and delivering results consistently and fast. Work ethic, solid communication skills, and obsession with winning are paramount. Our interview process involves several technical interviews and we aim to complete them within 1 week. Overview As Speechify expands, our AI team seeks a Senior Backend Engineer. This role is central to ensuring our infrastructure scales efficiently, optimizing key product flows, and constructing resilient end-to-end systems. If you are passionate about strategizing, enjoy high-paced environments, and are eager to take ownership of product decisions, we'd love to hear from you. What Yo u' ll Do State of the art voice cloning Low latency and cost effective text to speech An Ideal Candidate Should Have Proven experience in backend development: Python Direct experience with GCP and knowledge of AWS, Azure, or other cloud providers. Efficiency in ideation and implementation, prioritizing tasks based on urgency and impact. Experience with Docker and containerized deployments. Proficiency in deploying high availability applications on Kubernetes. Preferred: Experience deploying NLP or TTS models to production. What We Offer A dynamic environment where your contributions shape the company and its products. A team that values innovation, intuition, and drive. Autonomy, fostering focus and creativity. The opportunity to have a significant impact in a revolutionary industry. Competitive compensation, a welcoming atmosphere, and a commitment to an exceptional asynchronous work culture. The privilege of working on a product that changes lives, particularly for those with learning differences like dyslexia, ADD, and more. An active role at the intersection of artificial intelligence and audio – a rapidly evolving tech domain. Think you're a good fit for this job? Tell us more about yourself and why you're interested in the role when you apply. And don't forget to include links to your portfolio and LinkedIn. Not looking but know someone who would make a great fit? Refer them! Speechify is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Speechify does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

location: Da Nang, Da Nang City, Vietnam
job_description: We are Global Print-on-Demand (Global POD)! The Vietnam-based subsidiary of The Customization Group. We bring cutting-edge and scalable top-tier print-on-demand solutions to businesses and creators worldwide. Fast, sustainable, and hassle-free, because your vision deserves the best! The Customization Group is a global leader in mass customization, leveraging AI and automation to revolutionize the personalized products industry. With a strong international presence across Europe, North America, Asia, and the Middle East , we manufacture up to 2.5 million unique products daily , reaching millions of customers through 20+ own online shops and 1,000+ partner stores. Our AI-first strategy drives efficiency, scalability, and innovation - keeping us ahead in a fast-moving market! Our diverse team of 700+ professionals from 40+ nationalities thrives in a culture of collaboration and ambition. Whether in our tech hubs, production facilities, or business locations, you’ll find the perfect environment to take ownership and drive impact in the future of e-commerce. We have a brand-new opportunity for a TikTok Shop Specialist (US/EU Markets). In this role, you’ll manage TikTok Shop campaigns in US/EU to increase our B2C sales and support other sellers in growing their TikTok Shop business through MerchOne Reseller (our B2B brand) and TCG’s global production factories. Sounds exciting? Then keep reading! Why You Will Love Working With Us International experience in our globally spread fast-paced teams A role that evolves quickly, opening doors to new opportunities Monthly phone/data and transportation allowance for work support Annual Performance Bonus to reward your achievements Private Health insurance to support your well-being Social insurance contribution based on 100% of salary A 13th-month salary for your yearly contribution Dynamic and collaborative team culture and a supportive work environment What You Will Do TikTok Shops (B2C): Plan, execute, and optimize campaigns in US/EU (ads, creative testing, A/B experiments) to grow direct revenue Resellers (B2B): Build and scale the reseller network via MerchOne Reseller (our B2B brand) by identifying, onboarding, and enabling TikTok Shop merchants Creative Production: Develop and deliver TikTok-native creatives (ads, UGC, short-form content) to drive engagement and conversions Performance Analytics: Track KPIs (GMV, CTR, CVR, AOV, ROAS), and prepare weekly reports/scorecards to steer strategy Reseller Enablement: Create playbooks, guides, and workshops for resellers covering catalog sync, campaign setup, content strategy, and fulfillment workflows AI-Driven Optimization: Use AI tools for niche detection, content generation, campaign management, and performance analysis Cross-functional Alignment: Coordinate with factories in the EU and US to align capacity, forecasting, and fulfillment SLAs during growth and peak seasons Preferred Background Experience: 1-3 years in growth, e-commerce, or performance marketing, with actual hands-on experience managing TikTok Shops for US or European markets. (Local-only i.e., Vietnam TikTok experience isn’t what this role requires) Proven track record in scaling revenue through TikTok (ads, influencer collaborations, UGC) Creative instincts with an analytical mindset: deep understanding of TikTok culture, trends, and viral content dynamics while being able to interpret performance dashboards, KPIs, and data to drive strategy AI-native: fluent in using AI tools (for content, analytics, optimization, automation) E-commerce / DTC / creator economy experience is highly desirable Strong English communication skills, with the ability to guide and enable external partners Embrace the opportunities that await you here! Your journey may lead to new skills, relationships, and success. One team. Millions of happy customers worldwide. Join us! https://www.thecustomizationgroup.com/
